Title: 141: Supply Chain Analytics, Worldwide Consulting and Learning Data Science In Your Career
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Project Leader at The Boston Consulting Group, Artem Vladimirov. You will learn about the different aspects of supply chain analytics and consulting, the data science used for solving supply chain challenges, and how to get into, survive, and succeed in a worldwide consulting firm.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/141
